topic.title: Topic
topic.description: Any valid topic name addressing a single data-point

acks.title: Acknowledgements
acks.description: Control the number of required acknowledgements. -1 = all insync replicas must acknowledge (default); 0 = no acknowledgments; 1 = only waits for the leader to acknowledge

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The time to await a response from the broker in milliseconds

compression.title: Compression codec
compression.description: The compression codec used to compress the messages

fromBeginning.title: Consume From Beginning
fromBeginning.description: Only for subscribe: Where to let the consumer start consuming messages. If true, start from the beginning of the topic. If false, start at the end.
